SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `FAMILY` v join `MEMBER` m on v.MEMBER_NO =m.MEMBER_NO
WHERE family_delete_fl='N'
AND family_title LIKE '%${query}%'
AND family_content LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_NAME, v.family_NO, v.family_TITLE, v.family_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(v.family_DATE, '%m-%d') family_DATE FROM `FAMILY` v join `MEMBER` m on v.MEMBER_NO =m.MEMBER_NO WHERE family_delete_fl='N' ORDER BY family_NO DESC;
